00016 /*  This is the Rn string header file.  The standard Unix entry points have  */
00017 /*  been removed to be compatible with C++.  If you wish to use the          */
00018 /*  standard string functions, please include /usr/include/string.h.         */

00024 #define STREQ(x,y) ((*(x) == *(y)) && !strcmp((x), (y)))
